meanings.sent2: The portabilities of laptops allow people to work from various locations.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the picnic basket with such portabilities made the outing much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her bag had the portabilities of a magic pouch, fitting in more items than expected.
meanings.sent5: The portabilities of the foldable table amazed everyone at the outdoor event.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily carried or moved.
meanings.sent1: Travelers appreciate the portabilities of lightweight luggage.
meanings.sent2: The portabilities of smartphones make communication on the go effortless.
meanings.sent3: The cat's portabilities were put to the test when it tried to carry a large toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His ideas had the portabilities of a swift river, flowing freely and easily understood.
meanings.sent5: The portabilities of the new backpack design impressed the hikers with its comfort and convenience.
